title: Display font – Enacting
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822194354im_/http:/typophile.com/files/azer_3640.png)
author: Emma-L

comments.content: It must be **[Anselm Ten Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822194354/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Anselm+Ten/fonts/)** by Frantisek Storm [Storm, 2007]
